191
192     public final int code;
193     Key(int code){
194         this.code = code;
195     }
196     private static final Map<Integer, Key> lookupTable = new HashMap<>();
197     static {
198          for (Key value : Key.values()) {
199               //There are some colluding values.
200               if(lookupTable.containsKey(value.code)) continue;
201
202               lookupTable.put(value.code, value);
203          }
204     }
205     public static Key valueOf(int i){
206          if(i == 0 || !lookupTable.containsKey(i)) return UNKNOWN;
207          return lookupTable.get(i);
208     }
209
210     @Override
211     public String toString(){
212          return this.name() + "{"+this.code+"}";
213     }
214}
